title: Wild Wild West Cowboy Sheriff Twin Gun Dress Up Set Complete with Holster Belt with Two Toy Guns, Bullets and Badge, Kids Pretend Role Play Fancy Dress Playset (10 Piece Wild West Cowboy Set
features: Every little kid has a dream of being a sheriff who rides out in search of outlaws! It is a heroic dream about protecting peace. So, to be a sheriff is a glorious thing for them. To help make your child's dream of being just like a real sheriff come true, our deluxe Wild Wild West pretend playset is here for you

Surprise your child the most realistic and fun Western Rider with Twin Holster role play set for little ones! Ideal for children ages 3-10, our role play kit will make an ideal Halloween, Christmas or birthday present for your son, nephew or grandson! Kids cowboy and sheriff role play kit

Your little sheriff is in the house, you are secured and rescued and the cowboys are kept at bay! Inspire imagination, creativity, coordination, communication skills and much more. Made of sturdy plastic, this outstanding role play kit affords untold hours of imaginative play!

As sheriff it is up to you to stop the cowboys from running wild. Use your sheriff twin holster guns to stop their cowboy shoot outs. Once you catch the troublemakers put them under arrest so they don’t try to escape. Don’t lose your badge because without it you look just like a cowboy!

Look no further! Our all-inclusive Wild Wild West role play set will surely impress everyone at your next Halloween or costume party! High Quality Material: All pieces of this pretend play set are made of durable ABS plastic with high gloss paint finish, smooth, beautiful, and safe for children. Box measures: 27.5cm x 18.5cm x 3.3cm / 11” x 7.2” x 1.3” Includes: twin guns, holsters, bullets & a sheriff badge. Also a plastic belt to hold it all!
description: Product Description Wild Wild West Costume - Let Imaginative Play Commence! Unleash your child's heroic imagination with our deluxe Wild Wild West pretend playset—a captivating journey into the world of sheriffs and cowboys. This high-quality role play kit features twin holster guns, a sheriff badge, and other accessories crafted from durable ABS plastic with a glossy finish. Fabulous for ages 3-10, it's a fantastic Halloween, Christmas, or birthday gift, fostering creative coordination and communication skills during imaginative play. Let your little one don the Western rider costume, stop cowboy shootouts, and maintain order with this comprehensive Wild Wild West ensemble. Packaged in a stylish retail box, this set ensures hours of safe, imaginative fun for your young sheriff in training
